description: This Dart file defines the ProductDetailScreen widget for a Flutter app, displaying detailed information about a book, including cover image, title, author, rating, price, and action buttons. It also includes a ProductArgs class for passing arguments to this screen.

classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays detailed information about a book, including cover, title, author, rating, price, and action buttons.
